argument.description: An expression that returns a value of any built-in numeric data type.
An expression that returns a value that is character-string or Unicode graphic-string representation of a number.

description: The REAL function returns a single-precision floating-point representation of either a number or a string representation of a number.
sample:
SELECT EMPNO, REAL(REAL(SALARY)/COMM)
     FROM EMPLOYEE
     WHERE COMM > 0
